deck.paragraph:
PLEASE NOTE: Due to current government guidelines, for the time being all public events at the Gateway Centre have been suspended. Please check our Facebook page for our latest updates.
 

Our Sunday morning worship services take place at the Gateway Centre, Front Street, YO24 3BZ. The services start at 10.40am, with tea/coffee served from 10.15am. 
There are always plenty of other things also happening at Gateway. Click on any event below to see more details.
